channel.title: How can i make it say ::update 120 after server has been going for 28 mins?
channel.description: hmm dono if this is right place or what, but i have my server restarting every 30mins, and im wonder if theres away i can make it when ever the server has been going for 28mins, that it starts ::update 120 , but i want to do it automaticly and not sure if there is a way to do that.

item.title: How can i make it say ::update 120 after server has been going for 28 mins?
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

ada:

Try following the tutorial at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7872.0.html for scheduling your server restart. It might not be perfect but at least your server restarts. Combine this with an autosave every 30 seconds and this should work OK

dude, i made this, ROFL re-read my first post please…

item.title: How can i make it say ::update 120 after server has been going for 28 mins?
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

Try following the tutorial at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7872.0.html for scheduling your server restart. It might not be perfect but at least your server restarts. Combine this with an autosave every 30 seconds and this should work OK
